name: godbot
updateMsg1: 4.10.0 Accepting/rejecting suggestions now sends a message in botville, and accepted suggestions reward gold!
updateMsg2: 4.10.0 Startup messages now display the three latest features instead of only the most recent one.
updateMsg3: 4.9.1 Upgraded chat-killing contests' handling of deleted messages, and made it impossible to win twice in a row in case of a bot restart.
description: The 'GodBot' bot code, created for the unofficial Discord server of web and mobile game Godville.
author: Wawajabba#6917
